text: The canton of Abbeville-1 is an administrative division of the Somme department, in northern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Abbeville.Décret n° 2014-263 du 26 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de la Somme It consists of the following communes: #Abbeville (partly) #Agenvillers #Bellancourt #Buigny-Saint-Maclou #Canchy #Caours #Domvast #Drucat #Forest-l'Abbaye #Forest-Montiers #Gapennes #Grand- Laviers #Hautvillers-Ouville #Lamotte-Buleux #Millencourt-en-Ponthieu #Neufmoulin #Neuilly-l'Hôpital #Nouvion #Noyelles-sur-Mer #Ponthoile #Port-le- Grand #Sailly-Flibeaucourt #Le Titre #Vauchelles-les-Quesnoy ==References== Category:Cantons of Somme (department)
title: Canton of Abbeville-1
